page.title: 17SPORTS
page.content: There are a number of sports available in Renfrew. Football is probably the most popular sport with three junior teams: Renfrew Juniors, Renfrew Waverly and the YMCA team. In terms of football support the most popular teams are Rangers , Celtic and St Mirren. Local firm, Babcock Power, which has its own grounds, provide a number of sporting clubs and teams: boxing, cricket, weightlifting, hockey and football. There is also a boxing club at St James's. The local park has a bowling green and tennis courts, and the swimming baths run swimming clubs and canoeing courses. There is also a private bowling club. Renfrew Golf Club has an 18 hole course. In 1985 3 young people in Renfrew were picked for Scottish teams: Campbell McNeil_ swimming; Brian Adams_football and Neil Armstrong_boxing.
